update insect_category

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update insect_category set category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lation_name = #{lationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lft = #{lft,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rgt = #{rgt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_level = #{categoryLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_leaf = #{isLeaf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_user = #{addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select parent.* FROM insect_category node, insect_category parent WHERE node.lft BETWEEN parent.lft AND parent.rgt AND node.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY node.lft
